item.title: Core Values
item.description: For at least the last 12 years or more, I have shared the following Core Values with teams and places I have worked. Now to be quite honest, I do not recall any longer if I built these on top of something else, or if I just generated these out of thin air from my own thoughts. So any semblance to others is a happy accident of like mindedness. Iâ€™m quite sure over the years, I have modified the wording a bit.

item.title: About
item.description: A Brief Professional Bio Ray’s experience ranges from the seed funded startup to the Fortune 500 inside telecoms, ISP’s financials, media and security companies. Ray is a technical leader and problem solver, technically focused and solutions oriented team builder. He is known for delivery and has a reputation of getting things done. His background includes time spent from all vantage points of the software development lifecycle (SDLC). He has worked in: software and product development, systems programming, technical operations, automation, modern virtualization and containerization platforms, various cloud providers in on-prem, hybrid, and public.
